remarks: An injection is compatible with any relations on the base set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
f1ocpbl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : V -1-1-onto-> X ) $.
f1olecpbl $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V ) /\ ( C e. V /\ D e. V ) ) -> ( ( ( F ` A ) = ( F ` C ) /\ ( F ` B ) = ( F ` D ) ) -> ( A N B <-> C N D ) ) ) $.
